Resource.item: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page.
To add notification settings, use the appropriate button.
Create the new template and save its general settings.
Create the new template and save its general settings.
WARNING: the parameters present in the url have been modified manually, it is impossible to proceed with the loading of the page.
When creating a new model, you must first set a name (which will be used by default in the absence of any internationalization) and the service whose tags you want to use.
Error saving settings related to the system / notification systems
The selected notification system CAN NOT be added as already present in the list.
You can not create a template of this type.

It is possible to enable automatic notifications for the model, in particular through the email. It is necessary to indicate for which service and relative action an email must be sent with this model.
Main data related to the model

This version of the template is currently in draft, it is necessary to correctly set the content in order to pass from the draft state to the enabled state. In the list below you can define which platform services can be used to select dynamic fields to be included in the message text.
WARNING: with the new settings on the associated services of the template they have been identified some dynamic fields belonging to the removed services from the selection, here is the entire list:
Specify how you intend to proceed with these dynamic fields:
Remove all dynamic fields related to services that are NOT associated anymore with this version of the template.
Leave the fields of the services that are NOT associated anymore with this version of the template.
Template created successfully: currently in draft mode.

In this section it is possible to manage the personalization of the permissions on the model.
Select the community for which you want to customize the access / use permissions of the model:
